reviews.author: Suzanne Cupps
reviews.authorTitle: Chef de Cuisine, Untitled at Whitney Museum, NYC
reviews.content: We're big fans of Vitamix at Untitled! The kitchen really depends on having at least three or four of them for making sauces, soups, vinaigrettes, and purees.

reviews.author: Rocco Whalen
reviews.content: I equip all my restaurants with as many Vitamix machines as possible. It's an essential tool for creating high-quality products efficiently.

reviews.author: Naomi Pomeroy
reviews.content: Nothing compares to a Vitamix. Vitamix blenders produce an incredibly smooth product and velvety texture. Plus, they eliminate the need for straining and other steps that waste time and energy in a kitchen.

reviews.author: Andrew Volk
reviews.content: When we use a blender, we want it to evenly chop everything, every single time. The Vitamix is an absolutely durable tool, and it's something we know is going to be our workhorse.

reviews.author: Anna Henrie Henricks
reviews.content: I couldn't make my savory cheesecake in any other machine. It's like velvet when it comes out.

reviews.author: Lori V.
reviews.content: I bought my first Vitamix shortly after I was married in 1960...62 years later, we're still going strong and the blender works as well as it did in 1960.

reviews.author: Sarah M.
reviews.content: We use this every single day for smoothies, soups, and even grinding flour. The preset programs make it so easy, and cleanup is a breeze. Worth every penny.

reviews.author: Mike T.
reviews.content: Upgraded from a basic blender and wow - the difference is night and day. Silky smooth every time. The hot soup feature is amazing for winter.

reviews.author: Jennifer L.
reviews.content: Started with the E310 as my first Vitamix. Does everything I need - smoothies, soups, sauces. Simple controls and powerful motor. Highly recommend for beginners.

reviews.author: David K.
reviews.content: The touchscreen interface is so intuitive. Programs run automatically and it's easy to adjust on the fly. Makes healthy eating so much easier.

reviews.author: Amanda R.
reviews.content: The hot soup program creates restaurant-quality soups in minutes. We have completely changed how we eat in winter. The self-cleaning is a bonus.

reviews.author: Vitamix Quality Team
reviews.content: Less than 2% of Vitamix blenders are returned for repair. Instead, they're passed down to the next generation.

reviews.author: Independent Testing
reviews.content: Year after year, Vitamix's reputation is reinforced by independent testers who consistently rank them as the best blenders available.
